title: WTB: T215-2 Red Cross Walter Johnson
author: brass_rat

posts.post_title: WTB: T215-2 Red Cross Walter Johnson
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for a T215-2 Red Cross Walter Johnson.  

[url]http://www.legendaryauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=62582[/url]

I'm thinking that finding this copy is my best bet, but the trail runs quiet after it sold again in Mr. Sloate's 2008 auction.

If anyone owns this one or another they'd like to sell, please pm me.

Have a nice day,
Steve

Bump.

$100 finder's fee if you provide information that results in the sale of this card to me.

Thanks,
Steve

Yearly bump.  :)

Finder's fee* is now $101.92 to account for inflation.

Have a nice day,
Steve

(* Finder's fee is for a private sale and is not applicable if the card comes up in auction.)
